attributes.action: Remove the netting stopping the Sand Martin's from nesting on Norfolk coast
attributes.background: The Sand Martins return to there nesting area every year to nest, the council has placed netting on the cliffs to stop them while they do repair work, these birds will not nest elsewhere and there habitat needs saving

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of Norfolk Council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You may also want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250845
